BNF.Core.DecalSystem.DecalSymbolDef.label: Crimson Guard Political Commisar
BNF.Core.DecalSystem.DecalSymbolDef.description: A feared symbol on Vasilevsky, the Political Commisariate is the military arm of the Ministry of Loyalty which often finds itself on the frotlines.
